channel.title: Homes on Academic
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Academic

item.description: Biography I am currently enrolled as a postdoctoral researcher at the Technical University of Denmark. The current focus of my research is Geometric Deep Learning (gdl Journal Club). During my PhD I focused primarily on methods and applications in the domain of statistical learning. My PhD thesis is titled Sparse Classification - Methods and Applications. Beside my interest in ML, DL and Statistics, I also like to broaden my scope as a software engineer & computer scientist.
